INST1TEXT:
In this task, you will have to judge whether there are more dots on the left side or right side of the screen.  You will respond using the LEFT or RIGHT response keys.  The dots will only appear for a short time, to prevent you from counting them.  Judge as well as you can without counting, even if the dots have disappeared from the screen.  Respond as quickly and accurately as possible.

Click OK to begin.
INTERBLOCK: You may take a short break before continuing.
DEBRIEF: Thank you for participating in the study.  Alert the researcher that you are done.
